ai-patthana8.36:0.2_0: (This should be expanded in line with the teaching.)
ai-patthana8.36:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the purification of the teaching.
ai-patthana8.36:1.1_1: There is no cause for the people that gives rise to the Teaching.
ai-patthana8.36:1.1_2: There is no cause or condition for the purification of the Teaching, and not for the sake of hidden.
ai-patthana8.36:2.1_1: Neither gives rise to the Teaching for the sake of purification.
ai-patthana8.36:2.1_2: There is no cause or condition for the Teaching to an extensive teaching. And it doesn’t arise because of causes.
ai-patthana8.36:3.1_0: One doesn’t teach the Dhamma for the sake of nymphs. And he doesn’t give rise to the teaching.
ai-patthana8.36:3.1_1: One doesn’t teach the Dhamma for the sake of nymphs. And he doesn’t give rise to the teaching.
ai-patthana8.36:3.1_2: One doesn’t teach the Dhamma for the sake of deceiving principle, nor for those who don’t teach the causes. And they arise because of causes.
ai-patthana8.36:4.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
